summary: Defines a generic wrapper that attempts to retrieve a value from a Pydantic model, storing the value when it exists and populating error and message information when it does not; the wrapper evaluates truthily only when the value is present. Also provides a convenience helper to create instances of this wrapper.
business_intent: Simplify handling of optional fields in DSLs that build instructions or prompts, allowing developers to safely access model attributes while automatically capturing missing-value errors and messages.
